code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./BookList.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function BookList(_ref){let{books,addBook,deleteBook}=_ref;const[newBook,setNewBook]=useState({title:'',author:'',isbn:'',quantity:1});const handleAddBook=async()=>{if(!newBook.title||!newBook.author||!newBook.isbn||newBook.quantity<=0){alert('Please fill all book details correctly.');return;}const success=await addBook(newBook);if(success){setNewBook({title:'',author:'',isbn:'',quantity:1});}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Books"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"add-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Title",value:newBook.title,onChange:e=>setNewBook({...newBook,title:e.target.value})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Author",value:newBook.author,onChange:e=>setNewBook({...newBook,author:e.target.value})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"ISBN",value:newBook.isbn,onChange:e=>setNewBook({...newBook,isbn:e.target.value})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",placeholder:"Quantity",value:newBook.quantity,onChange:e=>setNewBook({...newBook,quantity:parseInt(e.target.value)||1}),min:"1"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleAddBook,children:"Add Book"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"list",children:books.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No books in the catalog."}):books.map(book=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:[book.title," by ",book.author," (ISBN: ",book.isbn,") - Available: ",book.availableQuantity,"/",book.quantity]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>deleteBook(book.id),children:"Delete"})]},book.id))})]});}export default BookList;
